txt.en: 'The farmers of the Fallows have felt a sore loss of their various tools and supplies. One is missing a hoe, another a sickle, and another some sacks full of goods.\n\n'Would you be willing to tour the farms in the southern Fallows to see what can be recovered? Many of the refugees of Wildermore have nothing. To reclaim the farmers' valuables would be a great kindness to them.'
'You have gathered the farming supplies left behind in the Fallows. The farmers of Forlaw will be grateful for this welcome delivery.'
The farmers of the Fallows have oft requested the recovery of their valuable tools and supplies, left at the farms when all were abandoned.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Ealswith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Ealswith.
The hoe, sickle, and sacks of supplies can be found at the farmsteads in the southern Fallows.\n\nYou should ride to the Fallows and gather the requested supplies.
